info.title: API Branch Offices
info.description:
### Make it possible to create branch offices in a massive, fast and safe way.

If you are a PSP merchant this service will help you create and update your branch offices in a faster and easier way. Through this integration you can massively manage your branch offices.

<!-- theme: warning -->
> #### To keep in mind
>At the moment, only the functionalities to create and update branch offices are active.
>
>You can also create or update branch offices of your merchant, either individually or in bulk, through the following form: 
>* [Sub-merchants or branch office affiliation form](https://soporte.kushkipagos.com/hc/en-us/articles/21820962629267-Affiliate-your-sub-merchants-or-branch-offices). 
>Additionally, we enable the following forms, so your merchant can share additional documentation with us during the affiliation process of your branch offices. Check the following links:
>* [Additional branch office documentation form](https://soporte.kushkipagos.com/hc/en-us/articles/21822197307539-Additional-branch-office-documentation)
>
>* [Branch office performance report form](https://soporte.kushkipagos.com/hc/en-us/articles/21823560721427-Branch-office-performance-report) 
>
>* [Daily branch office registration report](https://soporte.kushkipagos.com/hc/en-us/articles/21823673038739-Daily-branch-office-registration-report) 
>
>If you have any questions about the branch office affiliation process, please check our [Branch office affiliation process FAQs guide](https://soporte.kushkipagos.com/hc/en-us/articles/22027439629715-Branch-office-affiliation-process-FAQs).


## Integration process

Below we show you the steps to follow to achieve a successful integration so you can create your branch offices.


 >You must have a customer account in Kushki to use this feature.

### 1. Credentials

As a customer, you must contact your account manager to get credentials to integrate this service.

You will receive an email with the subject **“Welcome to Kushki | Your username has been created successfully"** which will contain your username and password required to use this service.

>This password is temporary, so you must change it when you enter your account for the first time from the Kushki console.

![Correo de creacion usuario](../assets/images/correo_credenciales.png)

### 2. Branch offices creation: 

Follow the steps below to integrate the service:

#### Step 1: Token generation

Generate a token by sending the credentials obtained in the previous step.

This token will be used to consume the [Create Branches Offices](https://api-docs.kushkipagos.com/docs/online-payments/branch/operations/create-a-automation-v-1-branch) or [Update Branches Offices](https://api-docs.kushkipagos.com/docs/online-payments/branch/operations/modify-a-automation-v-1-branch) endpoints.

**NOTE**: the token has an expiration of 60 minutes and can only be used once.

#### Step 2: Create branch offices

Use the previously obtained token to create up to 500 branch offices per request. It is necessary to submit all the required fields with the correct information to correctly process your request.

**Note**: each request will be reviewed and validated by the Kushki team before being approved or declined.

#### Step 3: Update branch offices (optional)

You can submit a request to update information for one or more branch offices.

**Note**: each request will be reviewed and validated by the Kushki team before being approved or declined.

### 3. Validations
 
Once the information is received, Kushki reviews and validates each request to create or update a branch office.

### 4. User notification 
 
Once the request has been reviewed by Kushki, the user will be notified by email if the request was successful or failed. **Kushki's response time is within 24 hours, there may be eventual cases that may exceed this time.**

A file will be attached to the email with detailed information about the request. **This file will be available for download within the next seven days, after which time it will not be available for download.**

![Notification email](../assets/images/CorreoCustomer.png)

Download 
[here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12YvQdaJpph4U3C7tnBJBDtTAEAj92Hrt/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=104276169672653654470&rtpof=true&sd=true) an example of the file you will receive.


## Using the API

To use the API you must ask for your Kushki credentials, composed by a `username` and a `password`.

* The current version of the Kushki API rests at: `https://api.kushkipagos.com/`
* The testing version rests at: `https://api-uat.kushkipagos.com/`


## Endpoints

We dispose various endpoints to start your payment flows, find our products available:

* [Request token](https://api-docs.kushkipagos.com/docs/online-payments/branch/operations/get-a-automation-v-1-token)
* [Create branch offices](https://api-docs.kushkipagos.com/docs/online-payments/branch/operations/create-a-automation-v-1-branch)
* [Update branch offices](https://api-docs.kushkipagos.com/docs/online-payments/branch/operations/modify-a-automation-v-1-branch)



[Return Home](/)

> Got a suggestion on this documentation? [Contact Us.](mailto:techwriting@kushki.com)

get.description:
Generate a token required to make a request to create or update branch offices.

#### Authentication

To generate the token and consume the API, you need to enter the `username` and `password` for a user type *Maestro Customer* (customer User Master). This user is provided by Kushki.


<!-- theme: warning -->
> #### User lock:
>If you enter your password incorrectly more than 5 times, your user will be blocked and you will have to unlock through the console.


<!-- theme: warning -->
> #### Service available in the following countries:
>
> Ecuador, Chile, Colombia, México, Perú.  
> Check out our full [list of services by country](https://api-docs.kushkipagos.com/docs/online-payments/services-by-country)

<!-- theme: danger -->
> #### Token expiration
>
>Tokens will expire in 60 minutes and can be used only for a single transaction (even if the transaction was wrong). You will need to request a new token when it expires.



> Got a suggestion on this documentation? [Contact Us.](mailto:techwriting@kushki.com)

parameters.name: USERNAME
parameters.description: Username obtained by email provided by Kushki.

parameters.name: PASSWORD
parameters.description: Password obtained by email provided by Kushki.

La propiedad Branches[0].Shareholder debe tener al menos un elemento
La propiedad ClientType solo permite los siguientes elementos 'KUSHKI MUNDIAL' 'LATAM'
La propiedad pspNotificationEmail debe ser menor o igual a 10

post.description:
Use this endpoint to request the creation of branch offices.

Use the previously obtained token to create up to 500 branches per request. It is necessary to submit all the required fields with the correct information to correctly process your request.

**Note**: each request will be reviewed and validated by the Kushki team before being approved or declined.

<!-- theme: warning -->
> #### Service available in the following countries:
>
> Ecuador, Chile, Colombia, México, Perú.  
> Check out our full [list of services by country](https://api-docs.kushkipagos.com/docs/online-payments/services-by-country)

### Kushki Mundial

Provides payment services in LATAM to companies that are outside this area and want to reach these consumers in a simple way, through a single integration. For more information you can check the page about [KUSHKI MUNDIAL](https://www.kushkimundial.com/).

### Kushki LATAM

Local payment processing in Latin America. Countries like Ecuador, Perú, México, Colombia, Chile.

> Got a suggestion on this documentation? [Contact Us.](mailto:techwriting@kushki.com)

patch.description:
In this endpoint you can activate, deactivate or update information of one or more branch offices.

**Note**: each request will be reviewed and validated by the Kushki team before being approved or declined.
